bodyV2.markdown:
Most UK venues take accessibility bookings directly to ensure customers are given the best seats for their requirements. Each venue has a dedicated Access teams with extensive knowledge of the theatre. In most instances, they also offer some form of Access scheme or plan where you may be able to obtain suitable seats at a discounted price. We would recommend reaching out to the venue of the show you wish to see.

Having said this, if you would like to take advantage of one of the special offers or discounts that we offer for productions, rather than the venue access pricing, you are welcome to do so. If you would like to book with us using our pricing and need any information regarding venue accessibility to decide which seats would be suitable for your needs, please contact us prior to making the booking via our Help Centre; we will reach out to the venue with your request and respond to you accordingly.
